plot: A spoiled and mean girl attempts to ruin her high school's wrap party after being rejected by her former boyfriend and her fellow students.
title: Sandy & Junior Especial
plot_es: A spoiled and mean girl attempts to ruin her high school's wrap party after being rejected by her former boyfriend and her fellow students.
plot_en: A spoiled and mean girl attempts to ruin her high school's wrap party after being rejected by her former boyfriend and her fellow students.
